summary: Build a fully functional romantic digital surprise gift website with a password-protected entry (special date), a multi-step creation flow for user-generated content, interactive animated sections (hero, flip-photo gallery with notes, love letter, quiz, hidden messages, final hearts/ending screen), and generation of a private shareable link.
architectural_notes: All displayed content must be user-generated; do not ship with pre-filled demo content.
Use special date (DDMMYYYY) as the gift page password for the entry screen.
Provide a unique private shareable link per created gift.
Mobile-first responsive UI with smooth transitions/animations; prioritize fast loading and SEO-friendly structure.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Subtle seamless heart pattern background (romantic-heart-pattern.dim_2048x2048.png)
- Elegant minimal heart mark icon (heart-mark.dim_256x256.png)
- Favicon heart icon (favicon-heart.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a multi-step, mobile-first “Gift Creator” flow in the frontend that collects all user-generated content with smooth transitions between steps: (1) partner name, sender name, email, special date (DDMMYYYY), (2) upload banner image + upload multiple photos and enter a personal note for each photo, (3) write the love message, (4) write the ending message, (5) live preview of the final gift page, (6) generate a unique private shareable link.

Store uploaded images in the frontend as user-provided assets (no demo images) and ensure fast loading by generating and using appropriately sized previews/thumbnails for the gallery while keeping originals available for high-quality viewing.

Implement the shareable gift experience route in the frontend (e.g., /gift/:giftId) that starts with a password entry screen; on correct password, transition smoothly into the main gift page with soft romantic animations; on incorrect password, show a clear English error and allow retry.

Build the main gift page sections and interactions using the creator’s content: hero banner with animated “For [Partner Name]” and “From [Sender Name]” text, flip-photo gallery (3D flip on click, back shows note), love letter section with typing or fade-in animation, memory/quiz section with creator-defined relationship questions, surprise/hidden messages that reveal on click, final romantic message section with floating hearts animation, and an ending last-screen message with soft fade-out and floating hearts.

Add creator inputs for the “Memory / quiz” content and for “Surprise notes / hidden messages” as part of the creation flow, ensuring all displayed quiz questions and hidden messages are user-generated (no pre-filled questions).

Apply a consistent, modern romantic visual theme across the entire app: soft pink/red/white palette, premium spacing, elegant cursive paired with a modern readable font, and smooth fade/slide/heart-float animations; ensure the UI is mobile-first responsive and uses modern UI components.

Make the frontend SEO-friendly and fast-loading within the constraints of a React SPA by setting appropriate document titles/descriptions for the creator flow and for gift pages (based on partner/sender names), and by minimizing unnecessary asset loading before password unlock.

Generate and include required static romantic visual assets (used purely for visuals) in frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., subtle background pattern, decorative hearts, favicon) without routing these assets through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Password-protected entry screen using special date (DDMMYYYY) with smooth transition into the main page
Multi-step gift creation flow (names/email/date, upload banner + multiple photos with per-photo notes, love message, ending message, live preview)
Generate a unique private shareable link for the created gift page
Main gift page sections: hero banner with animated “For [Partner]” and “From [Sender]” text
Photo gallery with separate photos, per-photo notes, and click-to-flip smooth 3D animation showing notes on back
Love letter section with typing or fade-in animation
Surprise notes/hidden messages that reveal on click
Final romantic message + hearts animation and an ending last-screen custom message with fade-out + floating hearts

Design/UX requirements: premium romantic style (pink/red/white palette, cursive+modern fonts), smooth fade/slide/heart-float animations, mobile-first responsive, fast loading, SEO-friendly, no pre-filled demo content (all user-generated)

Implement backend persistence for user-created “gift pages” in a single Motoko actor, including creation, retrieval, and password validation based on a special date in DDMMYYYY format, and returning only the minimum data needed to render the gift page.

projectName: Romantic password-protected digital love surprise gift website with multi-step creator flow and shareable private links
